content: Yes, "This Is America" by Childish Gambino is a great example of a music video that enhanced the message of the song. The video's choreography and themes, such as gun violence and racism, added depth and meaning to the lyrics. It became a viral sensation and sparked conversations about social issues, helping to promote the song and the album. The music video was so impactful that it won several awards at the 2019 MTV Video Music Awards, including Video of the Year.
